name: nodejs-api-server-starter
description: Api server boilerplate with Node.js and TypeScript

scripts.db:create: yarn run build && NODE_PATH=./app node app/scripts/createDatabases.js
scripts.db:migrate: yarn run build && NODE_PATH=./app node app/scripts/migrations.js
scripts.db:seed: yarn run build && NODE_PATH=./app node app/scripts/seeds.js
scripts.start: yarn run build && NODE_PATH=./app node app/index.js

author: AtaruOhto
